english.segment1: Love saves the soul. Hate kills the heart. Fear robs the goal. Hope gives a start
english.segment2: Forgiveness is a gift. Bitterness a chain. The ugliness we sift. His beauty still remains
english.segment4: When we all reach Heaven. There will be no shame. 'Cause when we stand before Him. He will know each name. Its all about believing. He died and took the pain. When we all reach Heaven. Its Mercy Over Blame
english.segment6: Faith heals the scars. That pride has brought upon. Grace will be ours. When all we have is gone
